task.title: Cleaning and Maintaing the Machine
task.shortdesc: The most important part about having this machine is respecting it and maintaining it for future use. Everyone doing his or her part individually will make for a much more enjoyable and responsible experience when using the ice cream machine. Following some of these simple tips will ensure we clean and maintain the machine properly.

taskbody.context: Our ice cream machine is equipped with an automatic shutoff feature if the machine begins to overheat. If faced with this problem, remove the freezer bowl from the base and clean the contents out before repeating a new cycle. This is likely to occur if the ice cream mixture attempting to be made is too thick for the mixing arm to succesfully churn the ingredients inside.

step.cmd: Clean the freezer bowl, mixing arm and lid in warm soapy water. The freezer bowl is not dishwasher safe!
Thoroughly dry compenents after each individual use. The freezer bowl should not be placed in the freezer unless competely dry.
Only place the freezer bowl in the freezer! It is to be the only compenent to every be placed in the freezer for cooling.
